page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content: Our grid reference of area for this survey covers part of{Banchory- {Devenick Parish}and part of{Maryculter {Parish.}The pupils who have done this survey and who present these pages attend Banchory-Devenick School and so we have used our name as the title although the school is outwith the grid. This is a rural area situated south and west of{Aberdeen}on the southern banks of the{River Dee.}It stands between 4 & 5 hundred feet above sea level, the coast being three miles to the east. Because of the area's proximity to Aberdeen and the{Oil Related {Industries}the families who live here are affluent and have many opportunit- ies. They can enjoy the advantages of the city and they have a very strong, settled community bond.
